```{r}
# load libraries
pacman::p_load(
  tidyverse,
  DataExplorer,
  dlookr,
  SmartEDA,
  forecast,
  prettydoc,
  Hmisc,
  ggthemes,
  gapminder,
  ranger
)
```


# EDA report
```{r}
# create report for all variables
create_report(
  gapminder, 
  output_format = "html_document",
  output_file = "gapminder_EDA_report1.html"
  )


# create report with a response variable
create_report(
  gapminder, 
  y = "lifeExp", 
  output_format = "html_document",
  output_file = "gapminder_EDA_report2.html"
  )
```

```{r}
# smart EDA report
ExpReport(
  gapminder,
  op_file = "gapminder_EDA_report3.html"
  )

# diagnose report
diagnose_web_report(
  gapminder,
  output_format = "html",
  output_file = "gapminder_EDA_report4.html"
  )

# eda_report
gapminder %>% 
  eda_web_report(
    target = "lifeExp",
    output_format = "html",
    output_file = "gapminder_EDA_report5.html",
  )

# Airquality transformation report
transformation_web_report(
  datasets::airquality,
  output_file = "gapminder_EDA_report6.html"
)
```
